name: Toilet Table
description: Toilet Table; Unknown; Paris, France; about 1777 - 1780; Oak and pine veneered with tulipwood and stained holly; marquetry panels of amaranth, satinwood, pearwood, tulipwood, applewood, ebony, and other stained fruitwoods; gilt bronze mounts; 71.4 x 80.6 x 42.5 cm (28 1/8 x 31 3/4 x 16 3/4 in.); 72.DA.67; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Toilet Table
medium: Oak and pine veneered with tulipwood and stained holly; marquetry panels of amaranth, satinwood, pearwood, tulipwood, applewood, ebony, and other stained fruitwoods; gilt bronze mounts
